member.name: GUITHREADINFO
member.summary: Contains information about a GUI thread.

member.name: GUITHREADINFO.cbSize
member.summary: The size of this structure, in bytes. The caller must set this member to sizeof(GUITHREADINFO).

summary.para: The thread state. This member can be one or more of the following values.

listheader.description: The caret's blink state. This bit is set if the caret is visible.
The thread's menu state. This bit is set if the thread is in menu mode.
The thread's move state. This bit is set if the thread is in a move or size loop.
The thread's pop-up menu state. This bit is set if the thread has an active pop-up menu.
The thread's system menu state. This bit is set if the thread is in a system menu mode.

member.name: GUITHREADINFO.hwndActive
member.summary: A handle to the active window within the thread.

member.name: GUITHREADINFO.hwndFocus
member.summary: A handle to the window that has the keyboard focus.

member.name: GUITHREADINFO.hwndCapture
member.summary: A handle to the window that has captured the mouse.

member.name: GUITHREADINFO.hwndMenuOwner
member.summary: A handle to the window that owns any active menus.

member.name: GUITHREADINFO.hwndMoveSize
member.summary: A handle to the window in a move or size loop.

member.name: GUITHREADINFO.hwndCaret
member.summary: A handle to the window that is displaying the caret.

member.name: GUITHREADINFO.rcCaret
member.summary: The caret's bounding rectangle, in client coordinates, relative to the window specified by the hwndCaret member.
